title: Empathetic Simulation Education to Strengthen Medical Professionals' Collaborative Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and understanding of professional tasks
context.additional_context: VR environment replicating real medical field scenarios to provide interdisciplinary collaboration experiences.

learning_goals: Analyze patient treatment scenarios from three or more professional perspectives (physician/technologist/therapist) and formulate collaboration strategies
Recognize peer professionals' workload through empathy-based simulation and adjust communication approaches accordingly
Learners can develop collaborative protocols to resolve conflict situations that may occur in real-world medical settings through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
